Quality Education.reason: The course itself is an educational program emphasizing active, student-centered learning and understanding of sustainability and governance.

Clean Water and Sanitation.reason: Water resources are listed as one of the key environmental issues covered in the course description, but not as a major recurring theme.

Affordable and Clean Energy.reason: Energy and climate change are discussed, particularly in relation to international negotiations and net-zero transitions.

Peace, Justice and Strong Institutions.reason: The course examines global governance, international negotiations, and institutional frameworks for environmental policy, linking strongly to governance aspects.
